name: Piss Off (Fox and Lion Games)
description:
POV: You're in a really gross, uncared for gas station bathroom. There are flies EVERYWHERE and your only choice to win the war is...biological warfare?! 

Piss on the flies to kill them, collect coins, drink special drinks to give your stream different effects and get a hi-score for the leaderboard!

This is a gross and goofy game - have fun!

This game is available on the App Store and Google Play for free!

------------CREDITS------------

LionJeff - Code - Sound - Design

LilyFox - Art - Sound - Design
